title: Mathematical Thinking Training to Improve Awareness of Human Trafficking

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Statistics and Data Interpretation Skills
context.additional_context: Convergence education program investigating social issues using mathematical tools or data analysis

learning_goals: Learners can analyze human trafficking statistical data to explain sociocultural contexts
Learners can evaluate the effectiveness of human trafficking prevention policies through mathematical modeling
Learners can design a human trafficking awareness improvement campaign using data visualization tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
